name: Glyph Pet
tagline: A Nothing-aesthetic virtual pet you raise, feed, and play with through minimal monochrome interactions
problem: Tamagotchi nostalgia meets modern minimal design — users want a low-pressure, ambient digital companion that lives on their phone. Existing virtual pet apps are cluttered, ad-heavy, and over-designed. Glyph Pet strips the genre to its essence: monochrome glyphs, simple gestures, quiet rituals.

targetUser.demographic: Design-conscious millennials and Gen-Z who appreciate Nothing Phone aesthetics, minimalism, and lo-fi digital experiences
targetUser.goal: Own a calming, low-maintenance virtual pet that rewards daily check-ins without pressure or guilt
targetUser.context: Quick sessions (30s–2min) during commute, breaks, or bedtime wind-down — ambient engagement, not hardcore gaming

features.name: Pet Lifecycle Engine
features.description: Core state machine: egg → baby → teen → adult → elder with time-based evolution

features.name: Glyph Renderer
features.description: Monochrome glyph-art pet displayed as geometric/typographic characters that evolve with life stage

features.name: Mood & Stats System
features.description: Track hunger, happiness, energy, hygiene as 0-100 values with natural decay over real time

features.name: Interaction Gestures
features.description: Feed, play, clean, rest — tap-based interactions that affect pet stats

features.name: Day/Night Cycle
features.description: Pet behavior and visuals shift based on real-world time of day

features.name: Persistent State
features.description: Pet state persists across app closes using AsyncStorage; pet continues aging in background

features.name: Mini-Games
features.description: 2-3 simple reaction/pattern games (glyph match, rhythm tap, memory grid) that boost happiness

features.name: Achievement System
features.description: Unlock badges for milestones: first evolution, 7-day streak, all stats maxed, etc.

features.name: Haptic Feedback
features.description: Subtle vibration patterns for feeding, petting, evolution events

features.name: Pet Graveyard
features.description: Memorial screen for pets that have passed; view their stats and history

features.name: Notification Nudges
features.description: Gentle local notifications when pet is hungry or lonely (no server push needed)

features.name: Theme Variants
features.description: Unlock alternate glyph styles (dot-matrix, ASCII, braille, circuit) as pet evolves
